class src.AIPlayer.Move(type, card1, card2, card3, reason)

Construct the Move-Data json

src.AIPlayer.canPlaySeeTrough(hand, searchedCards)

this Method analasize if a seeTroughcard can be played

Parameters:

  • hand – our handcards

  • searchedCards – the card where it can play seeTrough

Returns:

all the seetrough cards that can be played

src.AIPlayer.jokerAvailable(hand)

This method search in our handcards for jokercards

Parameters:

hand – our handcards

Returns:

the number of the jokercards

src.AIPlayer.numCards(topCard, hand)

In this Method is the logic for the number cards

Parameters:

  • topCard – is the reaction card

  • hand – are our handcards

Returns:

the move-data

src.AIPlayer.playJoker(fitCard, countJoker, cardValue)

This method plays the Jokercards

Parameters:

  • fitCard – the card that fits

  • countJoker – number of the jokercards

  • cardValue – value of the discarded cards

Returns:

the move-data

src.AIPlayer.playReboot()

This Method plays the reboot card

Returns:

the move-data

src.AIPlayer.playSeeTrough(allSeeTrough)

This Method plays the seeTroughcard

Parameters:

allSeeTrough – all seeThroughcards

Returns:

plays the seeTroughcard

src.AIPlayer.play_nope(hand, topCard, stateCurrentPlayer, lastMove, lastTopCard, stateHandSize)

This Method handels the different situations of the game state

Parameters:

  • hand – This is the Players handcards

  • topCard – This is the Card that the KI must reply to

  • stateCurrentPlayer – This shows which players turn is

  • lastMove – This shows the last Turn from the last player

  • lastTopCard – This is the last card that was played

  • stateHandSize – Here is the size of the handcards stored

Returns:

is the move-data json data

src.Requests.register(username, password, firstName, lastName)

The register Post to the server

Parameters:

  • username – the given username for the login

  • password – the given password for the login

  • firstName – the given firstName for the login

  • lastName – the given lastName for the login

Returns:

the success message from the server
